attributes.action: Help bring back the St georges celebrations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For many years now, St george's day has been regarded as a doss and big celebrations have not taken place for many years. Now I am probably younger than most users but I'm sure I'm not alone in thinking the the patron saint of England has been forgotten. Please join me in hoping to bring back what is truly english!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
